name: Achievement
description:
This was one of two school's projects to accomplish made in Unity. Taking 2 days of constant work, me and my teamates feel proud of what we created even tho we only had 1 week since we learned about Unity.

https://play.unity.com/mg/other/webgl-builds-188981

Tbh we wonder why Unity did made some changes in our scene after building up the project, but we hope you enjoy and get our game's idea. We did our best! :D
